 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלָּז‎</span> **pronoun common** ==this==, a rare synonym of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֶה‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזֶּה‎</span>, ***this*** (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhKAAeAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAoAB4AAAJyjI+py+0Po5z0AXZrA5yf3mnYFQZgJion6aUb6MayhM5mnaCtu+dtn8IhfkLb51MUFXXJVw9o2DWFp+FyOPKxfCpd1vrqHsXWKdVLRsLSUTRX6yGWSm12rr1ageFatVs1ktcUkxdmtKB32AWlGNX4iFAAADs="> (also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhHAAcAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAcABwAAAJUjI+py+0JIng0RDuxrObiLnnV5YUieKKZdpocE77ybM2rUt7LtmcprkPkaEJfUCY67noHJeSXdBaXHc6vBhpBfS9oUxkNf2GmMu9RVkmpxLb7/S4AADs=">), plural <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhLwAhAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAvACEAAAKIjI+py+0Po5z0gIoZ2DdLzgXg5k0kKXalOUbt+j7xWoW1o4pNzvKWiqIlgkOgT4gzIinKZXHRLBF/UCpsmqpaaDZEdwu+Qn1BLOaIzR13CptxWl6PL6NO3U1E29V1L+j3lTVkZWDmpKNxmLhY+OeXYZhHB2gIkVbZKOdyh3nIqSjjCDpKWnpQAAA7">, ***who, which*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֶה‎</span>, which is used also sometimes as relative), formed from <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhFgAeAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAWAB4AAAJHjI+py50AgVvQyPluzZdvG30eEmJKZ6YNKjrR0a5fzLygOqOTSFMsztLJSMJaMMUrKoknZYe2JDWnmGSxGer5sqpAqQsOJwoAOw==">, the definite article, and the pronoun <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֶה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זוּ‎</span>, with the insertion of the demonstrative element ***la***, and thus in fact = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזֶּה‎</span>: [[BDB#W|W]]<sup>AGi. § 347, CG p. 117</sup>) — usually with a substantive defined by the article, [[Judg.6.20|Judg 6:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַסֶּלַע הַלָּז‎</span> ***this*** rock, [[1Sam.14.1|1Sam 14:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעֵבֶר הַלָּז‎</span> ***off this*** side-across, [[1Sam.17.26|1Sam 17:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתהַֿפְּלִשְׁתִּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלָּז‎</span>, (+ [[1Sam.20.19|1Sam 20:19]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">τὸ ἐργαβ ἐκεῖνο</span>, i.e. (or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלָּאז‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאַרְגָּב הַלָּז‎</span> ***this*** mound (***or*** cairn), for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎האבן האזל‎</span>) [[2Kgs.23.17|2Kgs 23:17]]; [[Zech.2.8|Zech 2:8]] with a ***feminine***, [[2Kgs.4.25|2Kgs 4:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁוּנַמִּית הַלּז‎</span>: without a substantive [[Dan.8.16|Dan 8:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהַלָּז‎</span> to ***this one*** (= normal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָזֶה‎</span>).
